description:
Property Specifics.

Year Built: 2013
Council Rates: Approx.$1,600 per year
Area Under Title: 153 square metres
Rental Estimate: Approx.$650 per week
Body Corporate: Altitude Management NT
Body Corporate Levies: Approx.$1,627 per quarter
Pet friendly: Small pets may be allowed subject to Body Corporate guidelines

Enjoy the high life in this immaculate executive apartment that showcases bright ocean and bay views from the eighth floor of a five-star Darwin City residential complex.
The two-bedroom apartment captures abundant natural light throughout and boasts quality modern appointments.
You'll also love the spectacular entertainer's balcony, and you can't beat this incredible location that's easy walking distance to the CBD and Esplanade, and just moments to beautiful Mindil Beach and Cullen Bay Marina.

- Generous open-plan living/dining area presented in contemporary tones
- Large wrap-around balcony showcases elevated harbour and bay views
- Premium modern kitchen with stone bench tops and s/steel appliances
- Bright master bedroom features a corner walk-in robe and a luxury ensuite
- Second bedroom with built-in robe opens onto large wrap-around balcony
- Second bedroom also features direct access into the two-way main bathroom
- Modern floor tiles and split-system a/c throughout for fresh modern living
- Large, well-equipped internal laundry with plenty of storage space
- Lift access to apartment; security intercom ensures your peace of mind
- Side-by-side parking for two cars in secure residential complex

City professionals walk to work from this beautiful harbour-view apartment, and investors note the high rent returns on offer in this sought-after location.

The open-plan living/dining area drinks in abundant natural light and cooling ocean breezes, and contemporary neutral tones create a blank canvas for your personal interior design taste.

A wide glass sliding door connects the space onto the large covered balcony that showcases panoramic views to the ocean, and wraps around to the second bedroom.

Back inside, the quality modern kitchen features a large island breakfast bar, white stone bench tops, a stylish mosaic tile splashback, and stainless steel appliances including an under-bench oven and dishwasher.

The light-filled master bedroom will also delight with a generous corner walk-in robe and a stylish modern ensuite with floor-to-ceiling tiles, corner shower and modern stone-top vanity.

There is a built-in robe to the second bedroom that also features direct access into the two-way main bathroom and opens onto the balcony.

A well-equipped internal laundry/storeroom is conveniently located off the kitchen, and lift access, a security intercom and side-by-side parking for two cars complete this impressive package.

Act fast to see this harbour-view apartment and organise your inspection today.

To arrange a private inspection or make an offer on this property, please contact Andrew Harding on 0408 108 698 or Evie Radonich on 0439 497 199 at any time.

Vendor's Conveyancer: Lawlab Conveyancing
Preferred Settlement Period: 30-45 days from contract date
Preferred Deposit: 10%
Easements as per title: None found
Status: Vacant possession
Pool Status: N/A
